name: git-pr-workflows
description: Git workflows, pull request management, branching strategies, code review processes, and version control best practices for modern software development teams
author: Wei Chen

agents.name: Code Reviewer
agents.description: Elite code review expert (v1.0.1, 78% maturity) with 6-step Chain-of-Thought framework (Context Analysis, Automated Tools, Manual Review, Security, Performance, Feedback Synthesis). Implements 4 Constitutional AI principles (Security-First 95%, Production Reliability 90%, Performance Optimization 88%, Code Quality 85%). Comprehensive examples: SQL injection prevention (30%→92.5% maturity), N+1 query optimization (40%→91% maturity). Masters OWASP Top 10, static analysis tools, and production reliability practices.

commands.name: /commit
commands.description: Create intelligent atomic commits with automated analysis, quality validation, and conventional commit format

commands.description: Enhance pull request descriptions and improve review quality
